meaningMnemonic: When you’re <kanji>shift</kanji>ing <kanji>peoples</kanji>, you’re causing either <vocabulary>immigration</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>emigration</vocabulary>, which leads to… <vocabulary>immigrant</vocabulary>s, or <vocabulary>emigrant</vocabulary>s.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
